page.title: 10Highworth's Childrens Clubs.
page.content: We found out that there are 30 clubs for children in Highworth.We gave a questionnaire to every junior child in our school,and here are the answers: Our most popular clubs are Brownies and Swimming.26 people go to Brownies at 3 different places, also 26 people go to 4 different Swimming clubs.15 children go to Youth club and Cubs.14 children go to Imps.12 go to Short Tennis, 9 go to dancing.There are 2 different types.10 go to Choir that is 7 school Choir and 3 Church Choir. 4 go to each of these clubs, Karate, Scouts and Jucos, and 3 children go to Ballet,Guitar,Violin,Cricket and Guides. And 2 children go to Tap Dancing,Sunday School, Badminton,Chess and Football. And a lot of these clubs are held at School.
